dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5181 IH: Feeding Rural Families Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Tokuda introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to modify the thrifty food plan to apply to the urban and rural parts of the State of Hawaii.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Feeding Rural Families Act of 2023.
Section 3(u)(2) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2012(u)(2)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by inserting urban and rural parts of before Hawaii the 1st place it appears, and
by inserting urban and rural before Hawaii the 2d place it appears.
